results.title: Treatment of hypercholesterolemia and combined hyperlipidemia with simvastatin and gemfibrozil in patients with NIDDM. A multicenter comparison study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To compare the @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering efficacies of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@NIDDM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with combined (@<m>DISEASE_Coinfection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060085 @@@mixed@@@) @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ (@DISEASE_Hodgkin_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006689 @@@CHL@@@) or isolated @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ (@DISEASE_143890 @DISEASE_OMIM:143890 @@@IHC@@@).

citations.NLM: Tikkanen MJ, Laakso M, Ilmonen M, Helve E, Kaarsalo E, Kilkki E, Saltevo J. Treatment of hypercholesterolemia and combined hyperlipidemia with simvastatin and gemfibrozil in patients with NIDDM. A multicenter comparison study. Diabetes Care. 1998 Apr;21(4):477-81. PMID: 9571327
